channel.title: A problem, with my website, how can I make a new
channel.description:
How can I make a new PHP file??
I am using .smfforfree3.com

item.title: A problem, with my website, how can I make a new
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I’d seriously recommend that you don’t use Smfforfree3. If you’re going to use SMF software just download it from this website and upload it to a free webhost. Simplemachines also contains tutorials on how to set-up the forum software just in case you need help/don’t know how to.

Read full topic
item.source: A problem, with my website, how can I make a new

item.title: A problem, with my website, how can I make a new
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Ok I registered a smfforfree just to help you.

(and btw it sucks)

I went to ‘ezportal’ and there was a page manager link there. I just clicked the ‘New Page’ button.

Read full topic

item.title: A problem, with my website, how can I make a new
item.dc:creator: @spy_man47 spy man47
item.description:
@spy_man47 wrote:

Lol, this might seem stuiped, but how do I create a page that should give me a link??

Don’t blame me, I was hit by a car yestrday… lost memory…

item.source: A problem, with my website, how can I make a new

item.title: A problem, with my website, how can I make a new
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]This is Server Help.

You are posting about a website/forum software.

Try using SMF support forums, or try it yourself.[/quote]He posted in the General Questions section…

[quote=“spy man47, post:3, topic:343224”]Ok, Do I have to do anything…?[/quote]Once you create the page it should give you the link to it.

Read full topic
item.source: A problem, with my website, how can I make a new

item.title: A problem, with my website, how can I make a new
item.dc:creator: @dannydude8 dannydude8
item.description:
@dannydude8 wrote:

Ok. For example if u made ur website at smfforfree.com u cant do it because u dont have ftp access which allows you to upload ur own files. If u want to make a php file u have to have ur own host. There are free ones i recomend bighost.com or 000webhost.com those are the best free ones.

Read full topic

item.title: A problem, with my website, how can I make a new
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I’ve never used smfforfree, but unless you can access the FTP server, you can’t.

However some sites like that do have a feature that allows you to make new pages that you can link to, I check your control panel for that.

Read full topic
